channel.title: Final Devolution (best PVP and PVNPC combat)
channel.description:
ok i have been working everyday on this its come together very well its based from devolution 7.0 if you ask for pictures your a noob, read the features its better than anything else youll ever see on this website for alongggg time.
[B][U]features[/U][/B]
[B][U]-NPC RANGE (includes)[/U][/B] - arrow draw back - correct projectile heights and timings - correct max hit formula - all range items work - prefect hit delays depending on the distance - arrow deleting - basically looks just like how rs use to be - no process timing - level requirements - good bonus makes you hit higher
[B][U]- NPC MAGE (includes)[/U][/B] - correct projectile heights and timing - correct max hits - level requirements - rune deleting - small compact size around 5kb - 90% correct animations - splashing - NO process timing
[B][U]-NPC MELEE (includes)[/U][/B] - prefectly timed, NO process - fairly accurate max hit formula - Dharok effects, hits higher when hp is low (based from str bonus and str level, not just adding a random number....) - all specials work - replace the special handler with the smaller one which is like 2kb? - prefect dieing, uses emote, does not die instantly has a slight wait.
[B][U]-PVP MAGE (includes)[/U][/B] - player bonus determines if they will splash or hit - if you splash the damage does not show - ancient makes use there effects (ice barrage switchs gfx once frozen, blood barrage steals hp, smoke barrage poisons) - proper timing for ancients, ice burst hits nearly instantly, ice barrage hits a bit more delayed and ice blitz takes the longest to hit, works prefect for rushing - if the player is frozen it doesnt stack up the timer each time you try and refreeze, you must wait till there not frozen to be able to refreeze them. - all level requirements - rune deleting - no massing
[B][U]-PVP RANGED (includes)[/U][/B] - same as npcs - also player bonus's determine if you hit or miss
[B][U]-PVP MELEE (includes)[/U][/B] - same as npcs - also player bonus's determine if you hit or miss
[B][U]-PRAYER ADDED (includes)[/U][/B] - all protection types work, str prayer also adds more damage. - protection types makes the damage be cut in half from what it would of been. - no massing with draining, stays at a steady rate. - nothing else added, still working on it
[B][U]-POTIONS (includes)[/U][/B] - all potions works - need to make potions lower the stat back down to the original stat.
[B][U]-LAG ISSUES (includes)[/U][/B] - this server used very low resources, stays at about 0.5 - 1.8 cpu usage. - alot of things have been taken out from the process and used in a different way for timing. - stable, has not crashed on my yet, but i have noticed a logout bug but have no idea what causes it, note this only lasts 15 secs then logs them out. - client is only 300kb
[B][U]- PVP,[/U][/B] this server has a very nice pvp to it, this makes delta look like rsc, seriously.
[B][U]-PVP following[/U][/B] - follows player, if frozen you cannot follow anyone - follows with ranging and also magic and melee - if following a player then gets frozen, you cannot move.
[B][U]SKILLS[/U][/B] added basic firemaking and thieving
[B][U]START TOWN[/U][/B] starts in lumbridge all teleports require all the correct runes and levels this is realy a base to make a server out of it has one of the best combat for the servers around here.
there is still alot of things to do but i just cannot do them all so hopefully you guys can finish some of the things for this server.
[B][U]download[/U][/B] [url=http://uppit.com/9TGRVD]http://uppit.com/9TGRVD[/url] [B][U] CLIENT NEEDED[/U][/B] (if you do not use this client, the use of magic may crash your client.) [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VW8Y5P6K]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VW8Y5P6K[/url]
